songs.title: Medawase Rap
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Fortuaane
Yeah
[?]
Hmmm
What else?
Uhhr
Let go

[Verse 1]
Medwase rap, you push me from the ghetto
Up to the pinnacle, I will never ever stop (What else?)
Bought me a house, got me a car
Survived on my niggas on the block (yeah)
Now I'm taking over everybody move back
Cos I’m heading to the top (Yes)
And now I don't give a fuck (What else?)
Uhr! Pull up in my S Five Fifty, se wo hia me a
Fre me manager I'm so busy
Started from the bottom and I brought my boys with me
Manya cash mewo [?] but I’m still skinny
Me flow no apete wo Ghana but I'm still greedy
Mali, Cotonou, [?] to Lasgidi
Cash ne aba me spende holidays wo Fiji
Adie sa a ebe we dey run the fucking city

[Verse 2]
Fresh Blood, Midnight, Freddy Kruger
Darkness, Emily, Head of Medusa
[?], don't you ever call me a loser
Me rap no shorte me shippe bi wo Cuba
I'm about to release the beast to go get 'em
They wanna take me but please don't let 'em (Uhhr)
I say please don't let ’em!
No sin! No God! No heaven!
[?], I’m bringing out my ego
We started from Zero, you don't know what we know
I killed myself so my wife is a widow
You wanna be like me spend a night on my pillow
Chainsaw Massacre the Wrong Turn saga
Jason, Leaderface, Bonecrusher
Magnum, F Dane my top shatta
We taking over cos this be the Last Supper

[Verse 3]
Freme Makeveli, Ghana [?]
Dabia I’m skinny cos I'm fighting with the demons
First na anka me hustle now I'm a winner
Mede me maame ka cos me promise no dinner
Kwame Sefa, KKD ne Bola
Rap no me nshorte cos dabia me use solar
Follow me wo Twitter, check me resume
Ewomu se mu feeli me but me hype die a meye gay
Now!
What else?
